originalText.text: Love this place, hurt my lower back spine from snowboarding in terrain parks and too much golf swings. Dudes here helping me out getting recovered. The front desk girls here are the best, very professional and friendly!

text.text: Love this place, hurt my lower back spine from snowboarding in terrain parks and too much golf swings. Dudes here helping me out getting recovered. The front desk girls here are the best, very professional and friendly!

originalText.text: Jose has become my favorite PT in NYC. I’ve only had bad experiences with PT in the city including Spear and others. But ever since I’ve received care from Jose for my back and neck pain, I’ve noticed a significant difference in my pain. Jose is knowledgeable, kind, and such a good listener. He listens to all my issues with pain every single visit and suggests exercises to help alleviate the pain. And of course I’m not surprised that the exercises he has prescribed are actually helping. I would give 5+ stars if I could because this is the first time I’m noticing a difference from PT in nyc and I don’t kid when I say, I have been very disappointed in the past.

originalText.text: This place is very disorganized. They canceled my appointment one hour before the scheduled time because they had issues verifying my insurance for a booking I made one week prior. There's no reason for them to wait until one hour before my appointment to inform me about the issue. I had already taken off early from work to make it to my appointment.

There's no reason for them to wait until one hour before my appointment to inform me about the issue. I had already taken off early from work to make it to my appointment.

originalText.text: The atmosphere of this establishment is just great! From the friendly staff at the front desk to the staff assisting you with your physical therapy and the therapist themselves you could not ask for better. I highly recommend it!

text.text: The atmosphere of this establishment is just great! From the friendly staff at the front desk to the staff assisting you with your physical therapy and the therapist themselves you could not ask for better. I highly recommend it!

originalText.text: I had the most amazing experience here. Everyone here is incredibly kind, patient, and intentional about their work. I would 100% recommend to a friend.

text.text: I had the most amazing experience here. Everyone here is incredibly kind, patient, and intentional about their work. I would 100% recommend to a friend.
